hero.subtitle: Professional personal training with proven results.
hero.title: Transform Your Body, Transform Your Life

about.title: Meet Your Dedicated Fitness Partner
about.description: Hi, I'm Alex Johnson, a certified personal trainer with over 5 years of experience helping people transform their lives through fitness. My journey began when I overcame my own health challenges, and now I'm passionate about guiding others on their path to wellness.

contact.hours: Monday - Friday: 6:00 AM - 8:00 PM\nSaturday: 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM\nSunday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
